entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `deadline_date` TEXT, `deadline_time` TEXT, `scheduled_date` TEXT, `scheduled_time` TEXT, `category_id` INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY(`category_id`) REFERENCES `task_category`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE SET NULL )

indices.name: index_task_category_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_task_category_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`category_id`)

contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_task_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `task` BEGIN DELETE FROM `task_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_task_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `task` BEGIN DELETE FROM `task_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_task_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `task` BEGIN INSERT INTO `task_fts`(`docid`, `name`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`name`); END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_task_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `task` BEGIN INSERT INTO `task_fts`(`docid`, `name`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`name`); END
entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`name` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`task`)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `ancestor` INTEGER NOT NULL, `descendant` INTEGER NOT NULL, `depth` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`ancestor`) REFERENCES `task`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE , FOREIGN KEY(`descendant`) REFERENCES `task`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_task_path_ancestor_descendant
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_task_path_ancestor_descendant` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`ancestor`, `descendant`)

indices.name: index_task_path_descendant
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_task_path_descendant` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`descendant`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_task_category_name
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_task_category_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name`)

contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_task_category_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `task_category` BEGIN DELETE FROM `task_category_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_task_category_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `task_category` BEGIN DELETE FROM `task_category_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_task_category_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `task_category` BEGIN INSERT INTO `task_category_fts`(`docid`, `name`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`name`); END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_task_category_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `task_category` BEGIN INSERT INTO `task_category_fts`(`docid`, `name`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`name`); END
entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`name` TEXT NOT NULL, content=`task_category`)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `task_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `done_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`task_id`) REFERENCES `task`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_task_completion_task_id_done_at
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_task_completion_task_id_done_at` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`task_id`, `done_at`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `task_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `start` TEXT NOT NULL, `type` INTEGER NOT NULL, `step` INTEGER NOT NULL, `week` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`task_id`) REFERENCES `task`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_task_recurrence_task_id_start
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_task_recurrence_task_id_start` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`task_id`, `start`)
